title: Remembering a Music Star: Mani from The Stone Roses
summary: This article is about Gary 'Mani' Mounfield, who was the bass player in the famous bands The Stone Roses and Primal Scream. He passed away at the age of 63. His bandmates and friends are sharing kind words and memories to honor him. They call him a wonderful brother and a great musician. Mani helped create amazing music that many people love. This news makes fans and the music world feel sad, but it also reminds everyone of his important contributions to rock music. It's a story about remembering someone special and celebrating their life.
